cu.explanation_en: Setting the ciphering algorithm to the invalid enum 'nea5' will cause security negotiation failure and connection rejection.

du.explanation_en: Changing the T1a_cp_dl timing parameter to 430 introduces inconsistency with other timing parameters, causing synchronization issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 T1a_cp_dl 定時參數更改為 430 會引入與其他定時參數的不一致性，導致同步問題。
